alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Leon; Madison; Taylor; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 12 at 3:14PM EDT until September 12 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Wakulla County in Big Bend Florida... Southwestern Jefferson County in Big Bend Florida... Northwestern Taylor County in Big Bend Florida... Southeastern Leon County in Big Bend Florida... Southwestern Madison County in Big Bend Florida... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 314 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northeast of Woodville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Apalachee Regional Park, Cody, Goose Pasture, Hells Half Acre, Iddo, Chaires Crossroads, Lamont, Aucilla, Capps, Eridu, Nash, Cabbage Grove, Thomas City, Capitola, Chaires, Fanlew, Waukeenah, Wacissa, and Wacissa Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
